messages.ticket.embed.admit.title: ğŸ”´ Combat Log Admitted
messages.ticket.embed.admit.desc:
You admitted to combat logging. Same consequences as denial apply:
â€¢ You WILL be killed on next login
â€¢ Your items are in a player head at logout location
â€¢ Opponents can access for 30 minutes
â€¢ After 30 min, everyone can access

Thank you for your honesty.
messages.ticket.incident.title: âš”ï¸ Combat Log Report
messages.ticket.incident.desc: A player has disconnected during combat and needs to provide proof.
messages.ticket.incident.consequence: âŒ Killed on next login if not resolved
messages.ticket.player.reviewForum: {userMention} - Please review the incident and submit proof if needed.
messages.ticket.instructions:
**ğŸ“‹ Instructions:**

**For {userMention}:**
â€¢ Upload a clip/video showing you disconnected unintentionally (crash, internet issue, etc.)
â€¢ Accepted platforms: YouTube, Twitch, Streamable, Medal.tv, or Discord upload
â€¢ You have **{minutes} minutes** to submit proof
â€¢ If no proof is submitted, you will be killed on your next login

**For Staff:**
â€¢ Click **{approveLabel}** to clear the punishment
â€¢ Click **{denyLabel}** to confirm the punishment
â€¢ Click **{extendLabel}** to give more time
â€¢ Or use `/info <incident_id>` for details
